oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hand-colored tintype of Co. D, 2nd Tennessee Cavalry Regiment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Co. D, 2nd Regiment Tennessee Cavalry USA drilling in formation. The image shows guidon, muskets, carbines, and Colt revolving rifles. Co. D was predominantly from Blount County, possibly Cades Cove. The image has been hand-tinted.
